overview: A hot blonde step-mom (Vanessa Sierra) gets horny and can't get enough taboo sex with her stepson and his friends. Reluctant at first, step-mom slowly turns into a raging sex maniac until she's sucking and fucking her stepson and his friends. She's aching to taste cum and the three boys are only-too-happy to oblige.
title: My Stepmom is a Slut
